metadata.name: Code Review Diff
metadata.shortDescription: Comprehensive code review for git diffs using language-specific standards
metadata.description: Automated code review workflow that analyzes git diffs, detects programming languages, and applies language-specific review criteria from established practices. Provides structured severity-based feedback with file and line number references.
objectives: Analyze git diff output for code changes
Detect programming languages from file extensions
Generate structured review reports with severity levels
Provide actionable feedback with file/line references
